creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: heavy cream colored six-paneled fabric with thick embroidery on sleeves and around collar in front and back; zigzag, circle and diamond patterns in maroon, pink, purple and cream with small amounts of green and gold; small velvet circles on shoulder at each side of collar; looped (semi-circular) design of embroidery at edge of velvet inset around collar; corded tie at edge of collar; panels are stitched together with dark blue thread
title: Huipil
